actionConfiguration.body:
with worksheet_track as (select a1.chapter_tag,case 
							when a1.status = 0 then 'Not Eligible'
							when a1.status = 1 then 'pdf generated'
							when a1.status = 2 then 'Printed'
							when a1.status = 3 then 'Delivered'
							when a1.status = 4 then 'Reprint Requested'
							else null
						end as worksheet_track_status,a1.section_id,count(a1.pdf_generated_at)as generated_count, count(a1.printed_at) as printed_count ,count(a1.delivered_at)as 
delivery_status FROM  (select	*
FROM  worksheet.worksheet_track )a1  where a1.status > 0 
							--and a1.section_id ={{sec.selectedOptionValue}}
group by a1.chapter_tag ,a1.status,a1.section_id)



select sm.section_id,cdm.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_name,cd.worksheet_status, wt.worksheet_track_status,wt.generated_count, wt.printed_count , wt.delivery_status from public.section_master sm

join public.school_class_info sci 
 on sm.class_id = sci.class_id
 
 join public.school_academy sa
 on sa.class_id = sci.class_id
 
join public.chapter_details_master cdm
on sa.publication_id = cdm.publication_id and sa.subject_id = cdm.subject_id and sci.std = cdm.std 

left join worksheet_track wt
on wt.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag and wt.section_id = sm.section_id
left join content.chapter_dependance cd
on cdm.chapter_tag = cd.chapter_tag

order by sm.section_id,sa.subject_id,cdm.chapter_tag
